scripts.build-code: npm install && npm run clean-code && npm run lint && tsc && npm run copy-files-code && cd ./dist/ && npm install --production
scripts.build-function: npm run build-code && npm run clean-function && mkdir ./dist-function/ && cp -r ./function/* ./dist-function/ && cp -r ./dist/* ./dist-function/ManageLicenses && mv ./dist-function/ManageLicenses/FunctionApp.js ./dist-function/ManageLicenses/index.js && mv ./dist-function/ManageLicenses/FunctionApp.js.map ./dist-function/ManageLicenses/index.js.map
